title: Bonus: How Elon Musk Thinks - Sum Product & First Principles
description:
In honor of business guru and super-builder Elon Musk's 50th birthday, please enjoy one more dip into host Alex Lieberman's other show: Founder's Journal. On two special episodes of that show, Alex goes deep on the thought processes Elon uses to see what we can all learn from the self-styled Technoking of Tesla.
If you want more great builders' lessons like these, please subscribe to Founder's Journal wherever you listen to your pods.
itunes:title: Bonus: How Elon Musk Thinks - Sum Product & First Principles
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: Understand the two essential mental models that Elon Musk has used to create and grow his business ideas.
